verses.text: \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add is\add* an \w empty|strong="H1238"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, he bringeth \w forth|strong="H7737"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* unto himself: according to the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* he hath \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*; according to the \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* they have made \w goodly|strong="H2895"\w* \w images|strong="H4676"\w*.\f + \fr 10.1 \ft an…: or, a vine emptying the fruit which it giveth\f*\f + \fr 10.1 \ft images: Heb. statues, or, standing images\f*

Their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w divided|strong="H2505"\w*; now shall they be found \w faulty|strong="H0816"\w*: he shall break \w down|strong="H6202"\w* their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, he shall \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w* their \w images|strong="H4676"\w*.\f + \fr 10.2 \ft Their heart…: or, He hath divided their heart\f*\f + \fr 10.2 \ft break…: Heb. behead\f*\f + \fr 10.2 \ft images: Heb. statues, or, standing images\f*

For now they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We have no \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, because we \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; what then should a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to us?

They have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w swearing|strong="H0422"\w* \w falsely|strong="H7723"\w* in \w making|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: thus \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* springeth \w up|strong="H6524"\w* as \w hemlock|strong="H7219"\w* in the \w furrows|strong="H8525"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

The \w inhabitants|strong="H7934"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* shall \w fear|strong="H1481"\w* because of the \w calves|strong="H5697"\w* of \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* thereof shall \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w* over it, and the \w priests|strong="H3649"\w* thereof \add that\add* \w rejoiced|strong="H1523"\w* on it, for the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* thereof, because it is \w departed|strong="H1540"\w* from it.\f + \fr 10.5 \ft the priests…: or, Chemarim\f*

It shall be also \w carried|strong="H2986"\w* unto \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \add for\add* a \w present|strong="H4503"\w* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jareb|strong="H3377"\w*: \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w shame|strong="H1317"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of his own \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*.

\add As for\add* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, her \w king|strong="H4428"\w* is cut \w off|strong="H1820"\w* as the \w foam|strong="H7110"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 10.7 \ft the water: Heb. the face of the water\f*

The high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* also of \w Aven|strong="H0206"\w*, the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, shall be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*: the \w thorn|strong="H6975"\w* and the \w thistle|strong="H1863"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* on their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*; and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w Cover|strong="H3680"\w* us; and to the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, \w Fall|strong="H5307"\w* on us.

O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thou hast \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* from the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*: there they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*: the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H5932"\w* did not \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* them.

\add It is\add* in my \w desire|strong="H0185"\w* that I should \w chastise|strong="H3256"\w* them; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* against them, when they shall \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* themselves in their \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w furrows|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 10.10 \ft when…: or, when I shall bind them for their two transgressions, or, in their two habitations\f*

And \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add is as\add* an \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* \add that is\add* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w*, \add and\add* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* to tread \w out|strong="H1758"\w* \add the corn;\add* but I passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* upon her \w fair|strong="H2898"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*: I will make \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* to \w ride|strong="H7392"\w*; \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall \w plow|strong="H2790"\w*, \add and\add* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall break his \w clods|strong="H7702"\w*.\f + \fr 10.11 \ft her…: Heb. the beauty of her neck\f*

\w Sow|strong="H2232"\w* to yourselves in \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*; break \w up|strong="H5214"\w* your fallow \w ground|strong="H5215"\w*: for \add it is\add* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, till he \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w rain|strong="H3384"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* upon you.

Ye have \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, ye have \w reaped|strong="H7114"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*; ye have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of \w lies|strong="H3585"\w*: because thou didst \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thy mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

Therefore shall a \w tumult|strong="H7588"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* among thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and all thy \w fortresses|strong="H4013"\w* shall be \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*, as \w Shalman|strong="H8020"\w* \w spoiled|strong="H7701"\w* \w Beth-arbel|strong="H1009"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* was dashed in \w pieces|strong="H7376"\w* upon \add her\add* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3602"\w* shall \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto you \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of your \w great|strong="H7451"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*: in a \w morning|strong="H7837"\w* shall the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w utterly|strong="H1820"\w* be cut \w off|strong="H1820"\w*.\f + \fr 10.15 \ft your…: Heb. the evil of your evil\f*
